text: Alien Hominid is a run and gun video game developed by The Behemoth and first released as a Flash game on the website Newgrounds on August 7, 2002. ==Gameplay== In the game, players play as the Alien and shoot FBI agents and other enemies. It is similar to Metal Slug https://www.gamerevolution.com/review/32353-alien-hominid-review< ==Development== Alien Hominid started as a Flash game in 2002 and it made it to consoles in 2004.https://www.pelit.fi/artikkelit/alien-hominid-ps2 == References == Category:2002 video games Category:2004 video games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:IOS games Category:Indie video games Category:Mobile games Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Run and gun games Category:Side-scrolling video games Category:Video games about extraterrestrial life Category:Windows games Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Xbox 360 Live Arcade games Category:Xbox One games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games Category:Flash games
title: Alien Hominid
